attributes.action: Stop Outsourcing Companies Paying Lower Wages to Uk Employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work on the child support agency contract as a caseworker and we are only paid £14,500 a year to do wholly clerical cases.  Basically we do a lot of hard work sorting cases out and should get paid the same as the employees for the Child Support Agency
